reviews.text: This was a great place to stay. Room not luxurious but comfortable and roomy. nice bathroom. Rm 403 right off the pool area which is beautiful. good breakfast. front steps end right at the bus stop and a 3 minute walk down to the beach. I would go back tomorrow!
reviews.title: Loved it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked the Hotel over the internet after my oringinal booking through Travel rebublic at the Petinos beach fell through double booking i believe?? Got 20% discount of advertised proce so it cost about £740 for the 2 of us in the superior room.
reviews.title: excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Can't say a bad word about the place.
reviews.title: Loved it

reviews.text: All the staff were very friendly (especially Barbara the waitress), room cleaed ever day, Pool superb, most confortable loungers I've lay on, breakfast was excellent, anf the location is 5 mins from Psarou beach (there is a path just down the hill that takes you staright to the beach) and Platis Yialos beach is a couple of minutes further.
reviews.title: LOVED the Hotel Kamari

reviews.text: Cought the bus almost everyday either to Mykonos or to Mykonos on the way to Ornos or another resort., runs every 30 mins(£1.50).
reviews.title: Quiet Hotel to get away while on Mykonos

reviews.text: The room was big and the pool clean.Mr Thanassis(the night receptionist)was very polite.But the one in the morning was not!The breakfast was delicious!The cleaning lady woke us up 3 times because she was working till 14.30!!We were NOT given a RECEIPT!!
reviews.title: Quite good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location was fantastic, very short walking distance to Psarou beach & Platis Gialos beach & restaurants. Rooms were spacious, very clean, well appointed & bathroom great. The bus stop into town (which was a quick 10 minute trip) was situated right outside the hotel entrance. The only one downside was that the air con took a little long to cool down the room.
reviews.title: Fantastic value & location!

reviews.text: After searching for a long time for a place for our family of four to stay in Mykonos, I found the Kamari Hotel. I wasn't sure I would want to stay outside of Mykonos town but once we did, I was sure glad.
reviews.title: Perfect place for the end of our long trip!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I found the Kamari Hotel online and after reading TA's reviews, I went ahead and emailed them. They were quick to respond and even offered a 20% discount for booking through their internet site. Each time I sent them an email with questions, they were always quick to respond.
reviews.title: Loved Mykonos

reviews.text: The cost of the room also included a buffet breakfast and rides to and from the port or airport which in turn enabled us to save even more money.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel; bad weather

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hotel Kamari for 3 nights, and the hotel was absolutely the best thing about Mykonos for us. Our room was lovely, the pool was gorgeous and the staff were very helpful - especially Yorgos, the bartender. We enjoyed it so much, we even ignored the beach one day just to hang out by the beautiful pool. The hotel is walking distance to the beach, and from there you can take a boat taxi to any other beach on the island. Perfect hotel.
reviews.title: Best part of our time in Mykonos

reviews.text: Stayed here in the last week of September 2010. Actually, for the price have no complaints what so ever.
reviews.title: No frills. Simple and CLEAN accommodation.
One word
reviews.text: My experience was of a clean, simple and nicely run hotel. Staff all spoke good English and were helpful. I was impressed with the size and quality of the pool and bar area as a lot of local, bigger and 'fancier' hotels near by had much smaller facilities.

I probaly might think twice about going to this area at the height of the season as I'm sure it's pretty busy. At this time it was perfect and always easy to hop on the bus that ran every half hour into Mykonos town.
reviews.title: Charming Greek Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very cozy hotel. Made a shitload of noise and got no comments no matter what. Blame it on the Goose
reviews.title: it was nice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well, where to start? We had a fantastic time in Mykonos, it couldn’t have been better, and a lot of that was due to the Kamari Hotel, Dimitris the owner and his fantastic staff. I’ll give a few details. The hotel is in Platys Gialos, around 200 yds from the lovely beach. The bus stop is right outside the hotel if you want to go into Mykonos itself, (it takes exactly 10 minutes to go there). There are water taxis on the beach to take you to some of the other beaches, (Paradise Beach and Super Paradise Beach are the in places at the moment).
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.text: Rooms – we had the standard room and it was well furnished with a small terrace. Our friends’ room was a bit bigger with a nice view of the swimming pool and a small balcony, but that was the luck of the draw. We were both more than satisfied with our accommodation. Beds really comfortable and it was nice having a fridge in the room to keep drinks cold.
reviews.title: Little piece of Paradise

reviews.text: Cleaning – when they start giving medals to cleaners I will put these ladies’ names forward. Rooms and public areas were always kept spotless.
reviews.title: Great hotel with beautiful grounds

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Reception – very, very professional, always ready to help with information or anything else needed.
reviews.title: Great value in Greece - enjoyed our stay

reviews.text: Hotel bar – the barman was really nice and it was nice to have a relaxed pre-dinner drink in his company.
reviews.title: "Great location, great atmosphere, great people & great time"
